calendar.noPostsDesc: No posts are scheduled for this date
calendar.schedulePost: Click on a date in the calendar to view scheduled posts

postActions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this post?

instagramWarning.title: Instagram Post Published
instagramWarning.message: This post has been published to Instagram. Due to Instagram API limitations, published posts cannot be deleted automatically.
instagramWarning.deleteMessage: Please delete the post manually from Instagram if needed. The post will be removed from this system, but will remain on Instagram.
